author: Thiago Amin
title: Encapsulate-total-area template
question:
For the encapsulate-total-area problem (under Locals Problem Blank), why wouldn't the template tag be:
(@template Dir ListOfDir ListOfImage Image encapsulated)
instead of 
(@template Dir ListOfDir ListOfImage encapsulated)
since we encapsulated a function (image-area) that used (@template Image) tag. Is it because image-area is a helper function?
instructor_answer:
@6   please ask the course community to answer a question put right in front of us.
Don't ask us to first go find the question to get it in front of us and then answer the question.
